{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Tether car {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Tether car Tether Cars are model racing cars powered by miniature internal combustion engines and tethered to a central post. Unlike radio control cars, the driver has no remote control over the model's speed or steering. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tether car)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
